CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – Metro") , 1, IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – E1") , 1, IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – Fixed Line Services") , 1, IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – MetroG") , 1, IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – Broadband") , 1, IF( INCLUDES( Product_Interest__c , "Fibre – DIA") , 1, 0))))))
CustomField.label: Metro Fiber
